meanings.definition: The part of the body connecting the head to the rest of the body.
meanings.sent1: She wore a beautiful necklace around her neks.
meanings.sent2: The giraffe's long neks allowed it to reach high leaves.
meanings.sent3: The necklace was so heavy, it felt like a neks workout.
meanings.sent4: Her neks was like a bridge between her head and shoulders.
meanings.sent5: He held her close, his hand resting gently on her neks.

meanings.definition: The point or part immediately following or adjacent to something.
meanings.sent1: The neks of the movie was the unexpected plot twist.
meanings.sent2: After the storm, the neks was the rainbow that appeared.
meanings.sent3: The neks of the book left everyone in suspense.
meanings.sent4: The neks of the journey was the breathtaking view from the mountaintop.
meanings.sent5: The neks of the recipe was adding a pinch of salt for flavor.

meanings.sent1: They neksed under the moonlight, lost in each other's embrace.
meanings.sent2: In romantic movies, the main characters often neks at sunset.
meanings.sent3: The couple neksed in the park, oblivious to the world around them.
meanings.sent4: Their love neksed like a gentle breeze, comforting and warm.
meanings.sent5: She neksed his cheek softly, expressing her affection.
